content: The Java Double class wraps the primitive type double in an object. An Double Class object contains one field of the type double. The Double class contains a variety of other methods to help with converting double values or dealing with the double type in general.
name: Double

methods.name: Double
methods.content: new Double(double value) will return a Double object with the value passed to it.

methods.name: doubleValue()
methods.content: the doubleValue() method of the Integer class converts the value of an Integer to a Double type.

methods.name: parseDouble
methods.content: The parseDouble() method returns a double with the value of the specified String passed to it.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"s","type":"String","required":true,"description":"String s is the string to be parsed to a double."}]
